hero.title: Japanese precision, Hungarian craftsmanship — premium car detailing in Odorheiu Secuiesc. Exterior and interior cleaning, upholstery care, and meticulous detailing at the highest level.
hero.subtitle: P-Line Car Detail stands for a philosophy: Japanese precision, Hungarian expertise, and Székely heart. With experience gained in Hungary, my goal is to bring premium, personalized car care to Odorheiu Secuiesc — where attention to detail truly matters.

about.text: Japanese quality, crafted by Hungarian hands, in the heart of Székely Land.

reference.ref1: Full exterior and interior cleaning, care, and upholstery cleaning.
reference.ref2: Full exterior and interior cleaning, care, and Alcantara leather cleaning.
reference.ref3: Full exterior and interior cleaning and care.

service.serv1: Thorough multi-stage wash, finished by hand with premium products and techniques.
service.serv2: Cleaning and care of upholstery, dashboard, and interior elements.
service.serv3: Deep cleaning and stain removal on fabric and leather surfaces.
service.serv4: Gentle cleaning using specialized methods, with plastic and rubber surface conditioning.
service.serv5: Cleaning and protective coating for improved dirt resistance and long-lasting shine.

faq1.q1: How long does a full exterior cleaning take?
faq1.a1: On average, between 1-2 hours, depending on the size and condition of the vehicle.

faq2.q2: How long does a full interior cleaning take?
faq2.a2: On average, between 1-2 hours, depending on the size and condition of the vehicle.

faq3.q3: Do you also treat the surfaces after exterior and interior cleaning?
faq3.a3: Yes, in both cases all surfaces are fully cleaned and then treated with premium care products.

faq4.a4: For both exterior and interior detailing, I use specialized tools to remove dirt even from the hardest-to-reach areas.

faq5.q5: Will photos or videos be taken of my car?
faq5.a5: Yes, “before and after” photo or video documentation is made for each service, including for returning clients.

faq6.a6: Absolutely. We're human, mistakes can happen. I provide a 24-hour satisfaction guarantee from the time of vehicle handover.

faq7.a7: If any dirt remains, I will re-clean the treated area free of charge.

faq8.q8: Will your range of services expand?
faq8.a8: Definitely. Polishing and ceramic coating services will be available in the near future.
